Package ohos.data

Provides basic capabilities of the local data framework and data-sharing service. Local data generally refers to user-defined structured or unstructured data, such as the XML data. Data-sharing indicates the cross-device or cross-scenario data transmission.

This package contains the rdb ohos.data.rdb, orm ohos.data.orm, preferences ohos.data.preferences, and dataability ohos.data.dataability modules to meet users' demands on data services in different scenarios.

Since:
1
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseFileConfig
    Manages database file configurations.
    DatabaseFileConfig.Builder
    Represents a builder of DatabaseFileConfig objects.
    DatabaseHelper
    Provides a multi mode-data-access framework to operate application data in databases.

    Enum Description
    DatabaseFileSecurityLevel
    Enumerates security levels of the database file.
    DatabaseFileType
    Enumerates database file types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalPredicateException
    Represents an exception indicating an invalid predicate.
